ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then He causes him to die and buries him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He will then send him to death and have him laid in the grave.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: then He caused him to die and brought him to the grave,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then He caused him to die and be buried
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then gave him death, so had him put in the grave.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then He causes him to die and puts him in his grave.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then He causes him to die, then assigns to him a grave,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then makes him to die, and buries him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then causeth him to die, and burieth him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then He causes him to die and be buried.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then He caused him to die and made him to be buried.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: then He made him die and buried him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then He causeth him to die, and putteth him in his grave;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then He causes him to die, and puts him in his grave;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: then causes him to die and buries him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then He puts him to death, and buries him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:21] then He makes him die and buries him, He places him in a grave that hides him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then causeth him to die) after this, (and burieth him) and commanded to bury him;
